 2019-07562019-06-09ECCC,  HC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding a Toxic Substance to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisORDER ADDING A TOXIC SUBSTANCE TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 (CEPA) in order to enable the Government to propose risk management measures under CEPA to manage potential environmental risks associated with cobalt and soluble cobalt compounds.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0197 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
AttachmentsAttachment
